title: Luxury boutique hotel for sale
details:
A gorgeous 8 room boutique hotel on 100 perches of beach front land in upmarket Thalpe for sale for USD 3 Million or best offer.

• In a company structure
• BOI and tourist board approved
• Liquor licensed
• 8 en-­‐suite bedrooms: 4 sea view suits, 2 garden suites, 1 lobby twin and
1 lobby double
• 23 metre swimming pool with imported pool tiles and equipment
• Full fitted commercial kitchen and bar
• Beach Terrace
• Office and reception area
• Generator and generator quiet room
• Staff area changing room and eating
• Bar and restaurant terrace
• Features antique Jaffna original columns
• Art work commissioned
• Can cater for weddings and functions up to 200 guests
• Highly rated on Trip Advisor.
